evidence: So, in short, this diagram shows how the one-hundred-eighty-degree inversion, the recovery period, and the ninety-degree readout pulse together make it possible to measure T1 directly.

concepts.term: rotates whatever longitudinal magnetization has recovered into the transverse plane
